['Reduced  Decrepify allies movement speed slow from 50% to 25%.', ' Nether Ward\nIncreased required attacks to destroy from 3 (hero)/12 (non-hero) to 4 (hero)/16 (non-hero).\nChanged source of its damage from Pugna to the ward itself (this causes  Blade Mail to no longer reflect Mana Flare damage back to Pugna).', 'Increased required attacks to destroy from 3 (hero)/12 (non-hero) to 4 (hero)/16 (non-hero).', 'Changed source of its damage from Pugna to the ward itself (this causes  Blade Mail to no longer reflect Mana Flare damage back to Pugna).']
